main event: An unidentified object was reported hovering in the sky near Benton, Arkansas, on March 24, 1967.
interesting points: The object was described as a bright white light with occasional red flashes., The sighting lasted approximately three minutes., The observer reported the object hovering for about one minute before moving slowly southward., There was a suggestion that the object might have been a homemade hot air balloon., The observer was called away before witnessing the object's disappearance.
sighted object: a bright white light with occasional red flashes
witness description: Deputy Sheriff, radio operator, reliable and trustworthy
